    • Method Detail

      • takeTurn

        public void takeTurn()
        Description copied from class: Player
        Takes the player's turn. Specifically, it shows the human player his/her current hand and asks whether the player wants to hit or stand. The player will take cards until stand is chosen or the player's hand busts (exceeds 21). Each time a card is added, the hand and score are displayed to the player.
        Overrides:
        takeTurn in class Player
